name: Shipzap
description:
Shipzap is a simple mobile game about dodging asteroids in space. It was made in a few hours using sprites by hexadecimalwtf (linked here) and originally had backgrounds by VECTORPIXELSTAR (linked here) however the backgrounds have since been replaced.

Controls are fairly easy to grasp, up button to go up and down button to go down, however you keep moving until the opposite direction is pressed.
